issue.title: [C++] Default BUILD_WARNING_LEVEL to CHECKIN
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4336](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4336). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Default to checkin instead of production, such that it breaks early for new developers.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4336?focusedCommentId=16754569) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
